Name: :ref:`drop(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector <03_advanced:drop(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector>`
Description: "Returns the byte array without the first N bytes"

Name: :ref:`dropRight(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector <03_advanced:dropRight(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector>`
Description: "Returns the byte array without the last N bytes"

Name: :ref:`size(ByteVector): Int <03_advanced:size(ByteVector): Int>`
Description: "Returns the number of bytes in the byte array"

Name: :ref:`take(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector <03_advanced:take(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector>`
Description: "Returns the first N bytes of the byte array"

Name: :ref:`takeRight(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector <03_advanced:takeRight(ByteVector, Int): ByteVector>`
Description: "Returns the last N bytes of the byte array"
